divs: Sighting DetailsI was in a car (passenger) driving on Highway 91 east coming from Corona CA going back to Riverside CA, when looking out the window I saw this bright green orb like light in the sky arching down towards the ground...I thought to myself "its going to hit the ground" where there were house and such but before that happened it just vanished as quickly as it appeared. At first it looked like it was a green flare but it was not a "fiery" kind of light this was a steady bright light all the way to the point when it vanished. My reaction was more along the lines of "WOW what the hell is that?!". Again this was very fast and only lasted about 3-4 sec.
trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Corona
There were no other sightings in Corona on or around August 1st 2005
